titlestmt.titleproper: Inventory of the Alfred Connor Bowman papers
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Beaudry R Allen

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2015-11-11T08:25-0800
profiledesc.langusage: Finding aid is written in English

change.item: July 2015: 6 boxes were deaccessioned: May 2015: Re-appraisal, re-housed, and described.

physdesc.extent: 18 manuscript boxes, 2 oversize boxes, 1 card file box, 1 motion picture film reel, 2 sound laquer discs

did.abstract: Diaries, speeches and writings, correspondence, memoranda, reports, printed matter, audio-visual materials, and photographs, relating to Allied Military occupation of Italy, especially Venezia Giulia and Trieste, after World War II, and plans for military occupation of North Korea in 1950.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Alfred Connor Bowman papers, [Box number], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1966.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

chronitem.event: Received JD from University of Michigan
Admitted to California Bar and practiced in Los Angeles, California
Commander Major in US Army in World War II
Chief, Liaison Division, Allied Control Commission for Italy
Regional Commissioner and Military Governor of the Emilia-Ramagna Region, Italy
Senior Civil Affairs Officer of Venezia Giulia, Italy
Chief Negotiation Commander of Military Armistice Committee for United Nations Command in Panmunjon, Korea
Chief of the Army Claims Division, Office of the Judge Advocate General (OTJAG); appointed to investigate 1947 Texas City Disaster
Participant in “First World Conference : World Peace Through Law”
Published memoir, Zones of Strain: A Memoir of the Early Cold War

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: The Alfred Connor Bowman papers contains reports, writings, research materials, correspondence, photographs, and audiovisual materials relating to Allied Military Government (AMG) occupation of the Venezia Giulia region of Italy, and, to a lesser extent, the initial United States operations in the Korean War.

The bulk of the collection is related to Bowman's career as a Senior Civil Affairs Officer and Military Governor for the AMG, and is comprised of declassified reports, criminal case files, correspondence, and press summaries relating to the socio-political climate of post-war Italy and amplified conflict between Italians and Yugoslavs. The collection also contains photographs and audiovisual materials detailing Bowman’s experiences in Italy. Also included are reports and news-clippings in regards to United States military intervention in Korea, located in the Korean War file. The Subject files and Speeches and Writings file detail Bowman’s post-war career with the United States military and materials that were used to publish his memoir, Zones of Strain: A Memoir of the Early Cold War.
The majority of the files in the collection retain their original folder titles.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Consists of diaries, correspondence, curriculum vitae, news clippings, and printed matter relating to Bowman's life, career as a lawyer, and participation with the American Bar Association. Arranged chronologically.

did.unittitle: Peace Through Law European Conferences and American Bar Association,
Interview of Alfred Bowman by Victoria Billings, Daily Breeze,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Consists of speeches, published articles, a manuscript, and related research correspondence, articles, news clippings, and notes. Arranged by subject then chronologically.

did.unittitle: Civil Affairs and military government speeches,
Speeches made as Chief of Army Claims Division,
Research materials, news clippings, articles, and correspondence,

"Venezia Giulia and Trieste: An address on the unique expression in Allied Military Government, delivered before Provisional Reserve Corps G-5 Section of the Military District of Washington," Military Government Journal,
"The Military Government Training Program," in The Army, Navy, Airforce Journal,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Consists of correspondence, reports, memoranda, minutes, and printed matter relating to Senior Civil Affairs Office in Venezia Giulia. Includes declassified and public reports on domestic topics of the Venezia Giulia region and the Yugoslav and Italian conflict. Arranged by format.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Consists primarily of letters sent to the Senior Civil Affairs Office (SCAO).

did.unittitle: Acknowledgement of letters sent to SCAO
History of AMG Venezia Giulia by Functional Subject, Volume I, Agriculture to Military,
"History of AMG Venezia Giulia by Functional Subject, Volume II, Partisans to Transportation,"
"History of AMG Venezia Giulia by Functional Subject, Volume III, Miscellaneous,"
"History of the Allied Military Government in Venezia Giulia,"
Allied Forces reports and excerpts of agreements with Yugoslav Army,
"Reports on reaction to the Separatist Tendency and Yugoslav Army and Organization in Zone 'B,'"
Reports of proceedings at SCAO weekly press conference,
"Minutes of Meetings Held at Headquarters, AMG Venezia Giulia,"
"'Res Futura' A Compiled Political History of Zone 'A' of Venezia Giulia under Allied Military Government,"

General directives, Belgrade and Duino agreements,
"The History of Monfalcone and District Communes," part I and II,
"Prelude to Decision," report on Venezia Giulia under AMG,

Subject reports and notes on AMG in Venezia Giulia,

Military treaty booklets, programs, and ephemera,
Amgothic Lines, and other outbursts of an uncivil affairs officer,
Italian Allied Military Occupation Stamp Collection,
German surrender announcements in Star and Stripes,
AMG Venezia Giulia proclamations and AMG Gazette,
No. 603-616 Daily Press Summaries- Pro-Yugoslav, Pro-Italian, and Independent Press,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Consists of reports, orders, correspondence, agreements, and news clippings relating to Bowman's participation in the United States' effort to pass a resolution through the United Nation’s Security Council calling for military intervention in Korea and the subsequent cease-fire in 1953. Arranged chronologically.

did.unittitle: Far East Command (FECOM) diary and news clippings,
Extract of Korean War Crimes case reports addressed to United Nations,
United Nations Command Military Armistice Commission (UNCMAC) agreements and negotiations,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Consists of reports, correspondence, news clippings, and ephemera relating to Bowman's post-World War II career with the Armed Forces. Arranged by subject.

did.unittitle: Industrial College of the Armed Forces,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes images of the effects of war and Bowman's duties in Emilia and Venzia Giulia. Arranged by format.

did.unittitle: Bologna, Riccione, and Emilia region, Allied occupation,
Bowman's tour in Korea and honorary dinner at Stilwell Hall, Washington, D.C.,
Emilia region occupation and Bowman press conferences, scrapbook,
Reconstruction of San Daniele Del Carso, album,
The Officers and Men of 13 Corps, AMG, album,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Consists of a sound recording and a film.

did.unittitle: Farewell speech of Alfred Connor Bowman, sound laquer discs,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Bowman describes Venezia Giulia and the activities of the occupation force.

did.unittitle: "Trieste 1945-47: large roll: Rebuilding, ETC of Baetto del soppa, small roll: police review and various other village rebuilding + openings Cine-Film Rolls," 16mm film, 650 ft.
